snippet.title: BROK the InvestiGator - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
When Classic Adventure meets Beat 'em Up! Coming 2021 on PC, Switch, PS4/PS5 and Xbox.
- Play the free prologue! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1318790
- Also on GOG : https://www.gog.com/game/brok_the_investigator_prologue

#steam #ps5 #switch
